buildCommand: node -e "require('fs').writeFileSync('proxy.js', \"import { updateSession } from '@/lib/supabase/middleware'\\n\\nexport async function proxy(request) {\\n  return updateSession(request)\\n}\\n\\nexport const config = {\\n  matcher: ['/((?!_next/static|_next/image|favicon.ico|.*\\\\.svg$).*)'],\\n}\\n\")" && bun run build
